title: Dr. Tom Curran Podcast
description: Weekday Podcast from Dr. Tom Curran to awaken, unearth, and explore the riches of our Catholic Faith! Dr. Curran received his PhD in systematic theology from the Catholic University of America in Washington, D.C., a graduate degree in theology from the Gregorian University in Rome, and has an undergraduate degree in philosophy. For over 15 years Dr. Curran has been the host of a Catholic weekday radio show and podcast that airs on more than 10 stations and reaches tens of thousands of Catholics online. Dr. Curran is the author of five books including The Mass: Four Encounters with Jesus That Will Change Your Life, which was listed on Top 10 Catholic Bestseller List.  As a speaker, Dr. Curran has given over 2000 presentations to more than 350,000 people in 35 states and 6 countries. He specializes in many topics, including the Sacraments, marriage and family, evangelization, and the Holy Spirit. Tom lives in Eastern Washington with his wife, Kari, and their nine children.

title: Ekklesia United
description:
Because the modern expression of church has become more synonymous with or concerned about corporate branding, consumer or market acquisition, demographics, and free-market commercial enterprise the original creation, empowerment, and expression of the church (as found in Acts 2) has been lost. The church is the mystical body (believers) of Jesus Christ and it has one mission and that is to "Go ye into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature" [Mark 16:15 KJV]. The mission isn't to expand a brand or an enterprise and call it a church. The mission is, as a believer, to tell everyone and everything about the good news concerning the sacrifice that Jesus made (the message), and to everyone that believes this message they shall be saved; and to everyone that does not believe this message shall be damned [Mark 16:16 KJV, emphasis added]. Ekklesia United is focused on carrying out the mission of delivering this message to everyone and everything through digital mediums, ecumenical unification, and live events. There is no need to build another church. The church was empowered, built, and sent back in Acts 2. Today, we are tasked with continuing in the exact same work that started then. Therefore, Ekklesia United is not another church, but rather an assembly of believers united in the mission of preaching/delivering the message, the gospel of Jesus Christ, to everyone and everything so they will be saved.

Connect with Anthony Richardson, the founder and creator of Ekklesia United, on all social platforms @gr8rimpact or email at questions@ekklesiaunited.com. All the best to you.

title: Gospel of Jesus Christ
description:
Welcome to the Gospel of Jesus Christ, previously an Atlanta-based radio broadcast by Bishop Johnny Rutledge.  After the Atlanta-based radio station was sold and finally closed, the Bishop archived his recordings and called it a day.  

Then COVID19 hit, his previous listeners began to message him on Facebook asking him to revive his radio program because "People Need the Word of GOD and Prayer from a Real Man of GOD."

This podcast is for listeners that need more than what today's church has to offer. It's for listeners that don't have time for all the religious formalities.   It's for those that want to hear the word of GOD without all the fluff.  

The Gospel of Jesus Christ Podcast with Bishop Johnny Rutledge is all about preaching the word of GOD straight from the bible.   Bishop Rutledge preaches the type of messages that change lives.  He tells it just like it is.  It's the hard and fast truth with prayer--and it works.  

This podcast is a way for Bishop Johnny Rutledge to reconnect with the faithful listeners of the Gospel of Jesus Christ Atlanta radio broadcast and to introduce new listeners to his past and present messages.

title: Conversations at Midnight
description: Conversations at Midnight is a podcast focused on the discovery of the “more” in life; that through deep conversation and determined investigating,  I might, with humility and passion, help illuminate the more obscure, darker and mysterious aspects of this ancient planet we call Earth. This podcast is designed to pay homage and respect to what I believe to be serious topics. From the missing 411, to cryptozoology, aliens and the paranormal, my goal is to provide listeners information without jest or mockery, so that I may not mistakenly make light of a subject many are already too embarrassed or afraid to talk about. I strive to remain family friendly; there will be no profanities or inappropriate conversations. That being said, I advice viewers to still remain  cautious when listening, as these subject matters might prove too much for some audiences to handle, or too frightening for any younger listeners. Thank you so much for tuning in, and I hope my voice will help bring comfort to your hearts.

title: The Open Bible Podcast
description: Contending for the True Gospel.... The Open Bible Podcast is for Christians seeking answers to understand the scriptures in their context and mystries. There are passages that can be obscure to modern readers due to historical or cultural references. Peter said that Scripture contains “some things that are hard to understand”, 2 Peter 3:16. The lack of understanding & knowledge can be deadly. Psalm 19:7: declares that the “testimony of the Lord is sure, making wise the simple”. But the simple cannot be made wise by something they are unable to understand. Surely, the Word of God does demand the need for interpretation, explanation, and exposition of the scripture by diligent Bible Teachers. To comprehend God and His dealings with mankind in the past, and His plans for the future, is the main goal of these podcasts.

title: Front Porch Diaries
description:
Hey y’all!

I’m a God fearing, lover of Jesus mother of 2 {{birth}} 1 {{stepson}}
blessed wife of a handsome, hardworking husband.

Front Porch Diaries was created on August 26, 2020 on our front porch here on the creek of the Pamlico River.  Here on the porch, I have experienced despair, wisdom, faith, love, compassion, forgiveness, inspiration, hope and freedom.  But most of all God.  

Music is also my medicine.  It helps sort out all kinds of emotions that I may be going through.

I’ll be sharing devotions from inspirational women like Joyce Meyers, and reading straight from the Bible.  Share my testimonies, and stories, my life with my family- which is pretty amazing.  But far from perfect.  

My dream is to bring more people together through compassion and honesty and finding out who God truly created me to be. 

For more Front Porch Diaries
Join Front Porch Diaries on Facebook
Subscribe on YouTube

Much love to you all!  May blessings flow your way!

Whether by meeting physical needs or spiritual needs, Living Free has helped thousands of people in the North Mississippi and West Tennessee area.

title: Remnant Church
description: PURPOSE // To gather those called by their Father to know HIM in order to make HIM known // Malachi 4:5-6 Remnant Church of Denton exists for the purpose of raising up sons and daughters of Christ's Kingdom for this generation and the next. Sons and daughters as expressed in 1 Corinthians 4:15 and 1 John 2 speaks in a familial language. Once we begin to study the bible, we can understand the familial perspective from which it was written. In search of authentic relationships that mirror our studies we reach out to our local church. For many of us, this is where the journey ends as we discover institutionalized church that leaves us wanting. The leadership of Remnant Church desires to witness your potential and help you make it reality. Jesus said that the harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. We are not interested in gathering numbers or sustaining you on milk. Instead, we look forward to meeting those who God has ordained to make up our Remnant family; to live and learn mutual devotion together and look forward to the day that the student surpasses the teachers. MISSION // To grow, equip, and mature every saint for the work of THE ministry // Ephesians 4:11-13 "Each generation will praise your works to the next and proclaim your mighty acts." Psalms 145:4 CJB Scriptures such as Psalms 145:4, Deuteronomy 4:9-10, Psalm 78:6, and John15, presume that the believer is living according to the Genesis 1:28 mandate which is: to be fruitful, multiply, fill and subdue the earth. This does not exclude those who cannot or have not had physical children. We passionately believe in growing up in the Faith, from sons and daughters to mothers and fathers, that we may indeed make an impact on our current generation. Even more so that we might leave a strong impression on the next. Acts tells us that although God's promises may be first realized by us in our generation, that by design, it is given to us to impact the next. Teaching us not to live as consumers but rather, to lift up and pour into the next generation. Remnant Church’s greatest hope above all, is that the goodness of God that has been so abundantly poured out on our lives would be evident to all. We desire that our lives would be lived with such a passion and affection for Jesus, that what has been freely given to us would be imparted to those around us, whereby, fulfilling the Genesis 1:28 mandate to multiply His presence in this present generation. VISION // To give fully mature sons and daughters to all nations until the full harvest has come in, the bride has made herself ready, and King Jesus is enthroned in Jerusalem // Micah 4:6-8 Discipleship is a lifestyle not a program. We have found it best to simply: - live a life abandoned to Jesus - allow the Holy Spirit to gather those who desire to do the same - enter into everyday life together as we live and learn how to better re-present King Jesus to a hopeless and dying world. VALUES // To guard Holy Spirit empowerment, Lifestyle Evangelism & Missions, Historical Christian Orthodoxy, and Eternal Family // Matthew 28:16-20 ​

Ps Martin Duffy is the Senior Evangelist and Founder of Elim Church Global who has an apostolic call to the nations. Elim Church Global was founded in 2006 on the Central Coast, NSW, Australia as a base to support global outreach. We are a non-denominational church community where all are warmly welcomed and where the whole counsel of God is preached in the Power of the Holy Spirit. We are a Church which believes that the Word of God is infallible and is to be obeyed. We believe all the gifts and power of the Holy Spirit is for today. We are a Church that is deeply missional; seeking to go into all of the world with the good message of salvation through Jesus Christ. We desire that all who attend meetings encounter God Himself and leave changed by this encounter. We also deeply desire that people are able to flourish in their gifts within a loving and supportive environment. The prophet Isaiah inspired by the Holy Spirit spoke: Behold, I will do a new thing, Now it shall spring forth; Shall you not know it? I will even make a road in the wilderness And rivers in the desert. The beast of the field will honor Me, The jackals and the ostriches, Because I give waters in the wilderness And rivers in the desert, To give drink to My people, My chosen. This people I have formed for Myself; They shall declare My praise.” ‭‭Isaiah‬ ‭43‬:‭19-21‬ ‭NKJV‬‬ We hope and pray Rivers In The Desert will truly enrich and strengthen your spirit-man. May the Lord Jesus meet you where you are, at this very moment. Be blessed!

Connect with us at info@elim.com.au.

If you'd like Ps Martin Duffy and team to minister the word of God at your local, please contact info@elim.com.au.

title: Vision of Zion
description: Zion is both a state of being and a place. “This is Zion—the Pure in Heart.” Zion is also the New Jerusalem, and any place where the righteous gather. It is nothing less than heaven on earth. Zion will be created on earth before the second coming of Jesus Christ. This podcast explores the end times, and the events that are unfolding right now that are creating the conditions that are making ancient prophecies and covenants about Zion a reality. We will not only explore the word of God spoken to his prophets but also, we will put them in the context of today's current events, how you fit into God's plans, and the great joy and blessings that will come from participating in this heaven-ordained movement. We will also discuss the principles we need to learn and master in order to become a Zion people, our hearts knit together in love and unity.

God is still in the business of taking a mess and turning it into a powerful message of hope and redemption for our good and His glory. 

May we surrender our lives to Him and experience the abundant life that He died for us to have.

“The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly” (John 10:10).

description:
Join Brady, James, and Jerrod as they strive to live out the Catholic faith in college. Nuestros mensajes surgen de las Escrituras y las procuramos aplicar al contexto en que vivimos, para que como una comunidad de fe sana, crezcamos amando a Dios, amando a las personas y sirviendo al mundo.

title: Fixate PHX
description:
We believe in a church that is fixed on Jesus with unwavering attention and focus, that in a day in an age of distraction we fight back with devotion, that a life holistically following the ways of our Creator opens us up to be formed by Him and Him alone. A life of depth that produces fruit that remains, a life of discipline that builds everything we exist to do off of the Cornerstone, a life of sacrifice that shows the greatest love to a world so devoid of it, and a sustainable rhythm that keeps us walking with Him always.

We see a church that loves the least, last, lost, broken, and forgotten. We see a church that turns careers into callings, and conversations into moments where you sense the Holy Spirit. We see a church that seeks to see Jesus and allows the Creator to create with His most prized possession; us. 

You're invited to the journey, where we seek first the Kingdom and righteousness, and trust that He can add all things in His time.

title: Lessons in the Ladder Days
description:
Each show represents months and even years of research offering thought-provoking, non-denominational programming on current events in light of God’s biblical timetable.

Candace explains, “These are not normal times. We are living amidst a paradigm shift: from the Church Age to the Kingdom Age… and most Christians are disoriented. No one has walked this way before. My calling is to help listeners navigate safely to the Kingdom and find their destined places in the journey.”

Each on-air program may be part of a series.

title: Truth Unfiltered with Pastor Chad Harvey
description:
"We are a mission-sending base, called to build up and send out Spirit-filled agents for local and global transformation."

Cross Assembly Church is a cross-centered, Assemblies of God Church that amplifies the importance of holy living, Christian service, and personal salvation. We uphold the necessity of biblical teaching and understanding and emphasize the application of those teachings in our daily lives. We are a missions-minded congregation that pours our giving and gifts into the service of both local and global communities. Our church is known for its unwavering devotion to biblical truth, family-oriented structure, and exciting worship experience. Our dozens of ministries and partners stretch far and wide to unreached people groups and communities in need.

Pastor Chad Harvey is the Teaching Pastor at Cross Assembly Church in Raleigh, N.C. Each Sunday, Pastor Chad offers "Truth Unfiltered," leading to a deeper understanding of the Bible by putting the Scriptures in context and emphasizing how God's Word applies to our daily lives.

title: Living in the Light with Ann Graham Lotz
description:
Called "the best preacher in the family" by her father, Billy Graham, Anne Graham Lotz speaks around the globe with the wisdom and authority of years spent studying God's Word.

The New York Times named Anne one of the five most influential evangelists of her generation. She's been profiled on 60 Minutes, and has appeared on TV programs such as Larry King Live, The Today Show, and HannityLive. Her "Just Give Me Jesus" revivals have been held in more than 30 cities in 12 different countries, to hundreds of thousands of attendees.

Whether a delegate to Davos' Economic Forum, a commentator to the Washington Post, or a groundbreaking speaker on platforms throughout the world, Anne's aim is clear - to bring revival to the hearts of God's people. And her message is consistent - calling people into a personal relationship with God through His Word.

Anne is a best-selling and award-winning author. Her releases include "Wounded by God's People,", "Fixing My Eyes on Jesus," "Expecting to See Jesus" and her first children's book, "Heaven: God's Promise for Me."

Anne and her husband Danny Lotz have three grown children and three grandchildren. She is the founder and president of AnGeL Ministries.

His One Purpose podcast offers revealed knowledge from the Vedas, the oldest and most widely recognized source of transcendental science in the world. Listeners can tune in to the latest episodes on alternate days from anywhere they get their podcasts.

The podcast offers practical learning from our rich history, drawing real-life lessons from the examples set by great personalities throughout time. Whether you're looking to deepen your spiritual understanding or simply seeking inspiration to live a more fulfilling life, One Purpose has something for everyone.

With Brajsundar as your guide, you can explore the profound wisdom of the Vedas and discover how it can help you navigate the challenges of modern life with greater ease and grace. Tune in to One Purpose today and start your journey towards greater spiritual growth and understanding!

description:
Welcome to "So Much Uncensored," the podcast where Samim and Maz (SM) dive headfirst into the uncharted waters of life's most profound questions and controversial topics. In each episode, they'll bring you candid conversations, unfiltered opinions, and a fresh perspective on the world around us.

These two friends have been debating and discussing everything under the sun for years, and now they've decided to share their unfiltered insights with the world.

Intrigued? You should be! Samim was once a devout follower of religion until he went through a transformative experience that led him to question everything he once believed in. Masoud, on the other hand, had always been a staunch atheist but has recently found himself drawn to spirituality in unexpected ways.

Together, they take you on a wild ride through life as they explore the meaning of existence, question reality, and come up with new frameworks to understand the world around them. From controversial topics to taboo subjects, nothing is off-limits in their unbridled discussions.

So buckle up and get ready to join SM on their adventure through life. This is one podcast you won't want to miss!

His homeschool background, coupled with his experience teaching in the nation’s third largest public school system, provide a unique perspective on education that parents and teachers will want to hear.

What should you expect on a Tuesday night? The second you step into our venue, you'll be greeted by our Experience team. They'll help you find a seat or help you find anyone you're meeting. We typically do 8 to 9 modern worship songs with a full production. We have a Spotify playlist too in case you want to familiarize yourself with some of the songs! We also spend about 30 minutes in the Word of God. 

The River is not meant to replace church. We believe you should get rooted in a strong Sunday community. If you don't have a home church, let us know! We'll get you connected.

title: Well of Truths
description:
Well of Truths, a podcast idea that came to life when four friends Sean Sholola, Sam Omokodhe, Junior Mbuyi, and Aaron Kabenglele were hanging out and having a discussion about how the world is struggling to hang on to the truths that God created us to have.

This discussion gave birth to a podcast concept that would focus on discussing hot-button issues in today's society such as race, gender identity, relationships, vocation , politics, and purpose.

This podcast's major objective is to be the voice of young adults in a society where traditional, cultural, and modern theories have caused a lot of confusion.

Many people have questions and want answers, but they don't know where to look or how to get them, so they get off track.

Well of truths will be a resource where people can find their way to the right path which is the word of God found in the Bible. As John 8:31-32 says: “If you abide in My word, you are My disciples indeed. And you shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.”(NKJV).

With the help of the word of God and guest speakers from around the world, we strive to bring you the truth. Get Connected and listen to our podcast on Spotify. You can contact us through Instagram, Facebook, Gmail, WhatsApp, and text messages.

You can send questions our way and we will send the truth your way.

welloftruths04@gmail.com

title: Harvest Time International Church
description:
Greetings,

As your Pastor, my heartfelt longing is to witness every member of our church walking in complete wholeness. Wholeness encompasses the well-being of your body, mind, emotions, and spirit. In III John 4, the apostle John shared his greatest joy in seeing his spiritual children walking in truth. The truth is that Jesus came to grant us total victory over every aspect and circumstance of life.

Once you experience this wholeness, the next step is to guide you into your ministry. We are all called to be ministers of Christ. God has planted a sense of purpose within each of us—an innate desire to serve. This inner calling serves as a gateway to discovering your true passion in life and aligns with God's guidance for your journey. Our Lord yearns for you to lead a fulfilled life, and He has a unique plan and destiny for each one of you. Regrettably, only a few ever uncover their destiny, let alone fulfill it. It is the church's responsibility to assist those who seek to live life to the fullest in discovering their God-given potential.

May abundant blessings be upon each one of you.

Yours in Christ,

Pastor Stacey Carver

title: The Christian Patriot Hour
description: America. The "land of the free," the "home of the brave." We're all quite familiar with the words of Francis Scott Key's song, The Star Spangled Banner. But what is freedom anyway? What is the real meaning behind the word Liberty? Do we really know, or is it just a feel-good byword in our day; denoting freedom is something whatever one believes is appropriate for them. The truest meaning, the one America's Founding Fathers understood and conceived of for this great Republic, has now been relegated to the past I fear, lost in the shuffle of a progressive, perplexing, and troubled world which knows not the truth of our founding, neither the Almighty God who instituted the ideals of Liberty under God. Come along with me on an amazing journey as we navigate the waters of the past, looking into America's astonishing history, unrevised, unadulterated, and revealed without apology. We will find the truth together, and those who recall, they shall remember, and they who do not know, then shall they know. "If the foundations be destroyed, what can the righteous do?" (Psalms 11:3, KJV) I shall be drawing from Holy Scriptures, and from my book throughout. The book is Americans We Were. I am Henry Thomas Weber. Americans We Were: Weber, Henry Thomas

title: Antediluvian Revelations: A Poetic Retelling of The Book of Enoch, The Prophet, Season One
description:
Antediluvian Revelations is a series of podcasts that presents the ancient Book of Enoch in a poetic format. The first episode is the introduction to the series, which explains the origination of the text and the poetic concept applied to retelling the story. Although it may actually predate the writings of Moses, The Book of Enoch was not included in the canonized Holy Bible, the most well-known religious text in the world, but the text has been considered one of the Kabbalah texts, which is ancient sect of Judaism that professed the existence of extraterrestrial life.

There are five parts of the poem, and each part is followed by a discussion episode that provides the literary analysis and critical thinking of the author about the poetry and its content. The full text may be available for download as a PDF in the near future for paid subscribers, and this podcast version is based upon the third edition of the manuscript dated 1 March 2023. Episodes will be released weekly. The final episode of Part One will be released on 5 August. Including the introduction episode, the total number of episodes will be 21: Season One is Part One with six episodes, Season Two is Part Two with six episodes, Season Three consists of Part Three, Four, and five with nine episodes. The third season has shorter episodes than the first two seasons, so the three parts will run consecutively instead of being separated into different seasons.

Be sure to follow or subscribe to receive notifications of newly released episodes as they become available. (Notes updated on 8/11/2023).

Thank you for listening!

Content descriptors: Religion, Extraterrestrial Encounters, Prophecy, Epic Poetry, Avant Garde, Apocalypse, History, and Unsolved Mysteries.

title: O que é o Espiritismo
description:
A Obra O que é o espiritismo, de Allan Kardec, é uma Introdução ao conhecimento do mundo invisível, pelas manifestações dos espíritos, contendo o resumo dos princípios da Doutrina Espírita e respostas às principais objeções que podem ser apresentadas.

Sob a forma de diálogos, o primeiro capítulo responde às observações mais comuns feitas por aqueles que desconhecem os princípios fundamentais da Doutrina. No segundo capítulo, há uma exposição simples das partes da ciência prática e experimental, sobre as quais, na falta de uma instrução teórica completa, o observador novato deve fixar a sua atenção para poder julgar com conhecimento de causa; é, aproximadamente, um resumo de O livro dos médiuns. No terceiro capítulo, publicamos um resumo de O livro dos espíritos, com a solução, pela Doutrina Espírita, de certo número de problemas do mais alto interesse, de ordem psicológica, moral e filosófica, que diariamente são propostos. Estes resumos não somente são úteis aos principiantes, que neles poderão, em pouco tempo, ter o conhecimento das noções mais essenciais da Doutrina Espírita, senão, também, aos adeptos, pois lhes fornecem os meios para responderem às primeiras objeções que não deixarão de lhes apresentar.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: O Livro dos Médiuns
description:
O Livro dos Médiuns de Allan Kardec é uma obra essencial no estudo e na prática da mediunidade. Dividido em duas partes, Kardec explora de forma sistemática e abrangente diversos aspectos relacionados à mediunidade, fornecendo orientações, esclarecimentos e exemplos práticos. Ele aborda temas como a natureza dos espíritos, os tipos de mediunidade, o desenvolvimento mediúnico, a comunicação com os espíritos, a obsessão, as evocações e os médiuns curadores, entre outros. O livro apresenta uma abordagem científica e racional, embasada em observações e experimentações, visando orientar tanto médiuns quanto estudiosos interessados na compreensão e no exercício responsável da mediunidade. Com linguagem clara e didática, Kardec busca desmistificar conceitos, fornecer diretrizes éticas e oferecer recursos práticos para o trabalho mediúnico sério e consciente.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

title: Tramas do Destino
description:
Este podcast tem por objetivo o estudo do livro de Manoel Philomeno de Miranda (Espírito), psicografado por Divaldo Franco que aborda de forma profunda e sensível as questões relacionadas ao destino humano. Temos aqui a história do Espírito Ártemis, que abre mão de sua condição feliz no mundo espiritual para ajudar antigos afetos, numa reencarnação difícil, não por débito, mas por amor. Mostra a vida de renúncia deste Espírito, numa pequena cidade do interior da Bahia, frente às obsessões perniciosas, enfermidades como a hanseníase e dores morais superlativas, a fim de promover a redenção do seu clã. Atesta os benefícios dos ensinamentos espíritas, tendo na reencarnação a chave, a explicação dos sofrimentos humanos. Objetiva alertar e consolar aos que, na trama dos destinos, se veem atados nas redes dos compromissos procedentes das vidas passadas. Ressalta-se a vitória do amor vencendo o túmulo, já que a morte não existe, refletindo a verdade do Amor, Justiça e Misericórdia divina.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: No Rumo do Mundo de Regeneração
description:
"No Rumo do Mundo de Regeneração" é um livro psicografado por Divaldo Franco, atribuído a Manoel Philomeno de Miranda. Ele apresenta uma visão otimista sobre a evolução espiritual da Terra, rumo a um mundo regenerado. O autor aborda questões como egoísmo, ganância e violência, enfatizando a importância da reforma íntima e do cultivo de virtudes como amor, solidariedade e paz. Ele oferece orientações práticas para contribuir com essa transformação, destacando a importância da educação, família, trabalho, autoconhecimento e espiritualidade. Além disso, explora a visão espírita sobre a vida após a morte e a lei de causa e efeito. O livro transmite uma mensagem de esperança, incentivando o engajamento na construção de um mundo melhor através da transformação interior e do serviço ao próximo.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: Nas Fronteiras da Loucura
description:
Este podcast tem como objetivo o estudo do livro "Nas Fronteiras da Loucura", de autoria de Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, psicografado por Divaldo Franco. O livro trata da temática da loucura sob a perspectiva espírita, oferecendo esclarecimentos sobre as causas espirituais e os tratamentos relacionados aos distúrbios mentais. Ao lado de Bezerra de Menezes, o autor espiritual narra suas observações durante o período de um carnaval carioca. Aborda as várias técnicas obsessivas em casos de abusos e alienações com droga, álcool, sexo, aborto e tentativa de suicídio. Demonstra o trabalho dos Bons Espíritos num Posto de Socorro Central no mundo espiritual. São apresentados casos reais de pacientes com distúrbios mentais, ressaltando a importância da terapia espiritual, da mediunidade terapêutica e do apoio fraterno em seu processo de recuperação. O livro também enfatiza a responsabilidade social em relação aos doentes mentais, buscando promover a compreensão, acolhimento e cuidado por parte da sociedade.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: O Livro dos Espíritos
description:
Este podcast tem como objetivo o estudo de O Livro dos Espíritos que é uma obra fundamental da doutrina espírita. Foi codificada pelo educador francês Allan Kardec no século XIX. Publicado pela primeira vez em 1857, o livro é composto por uma série de perguntas e respostas que abordam os princípios e os fundamentos da filosofia espírita. Dividido em quatro partes, O Livro dos Espíritos busca fornecer uma compreensão mais profunda sobre a natureza do espírito, a imortalidade da alma, as leis morais, a vida após a morte e a existência de Deus. Tem como objetivo principal esclarecer questões filosóficas, morais e espirituais, buscando promover o entendimento sobre a natureza humana, o propósito da vida e a relação entre os seres espirituais e o mundo material. Através de suas respostas, Kardec procurou consolidar uma visão de mundo fundamentada na razão, na lógica e na busca pelo progresso moral e intelectual.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: Painéis da Obsessão
description:
"Painéis da Obsessão" é um livro psicografado por Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, através da mediunidade de Divaldo Franco. Publicado em 1995, faz parte da série "A Vida no Mundo Espiritual". O livro aborda temas relacionados à obsessão espiritual e seus impactos na vida das pessoas.

Feito de painéis que retratam obsessões, este livro resume diversos estudos sobre essa palpitante questão, especialmente procurando demostrar como, ao lado do desequilíbrio emocional causado pelos perturbadores do Além-túmulo, a tuberculose mais facilmente se manifesta em razão do bombardeio sofrido pelos macrófagos, degenerados pela contínua ação mental leviana do próprio paciente e, também, decorrente da intoxicação por sucessivas ondas mentais desagregadoras do seu perseguidor, favorecendo, assim, a instalação e virulência do bacilo de Koch, com as consequências compreensíveis em quadro de tal natureza. Outrossim, examinamos ocorrências variadas, nas quais a obsessão se encontra presente, bem como as técnicas e terapias espirituais aplicadas, nem sempre aceitas ou assimiladas pelos enfermos de ambos os lados da vida. Fazemos votos de que estas páginas encontrem ressonância nos que padecem de obsessões, auxiliando-os a desvencilhar-se da cruel ocorrência, ao mesmo tempo em que possam contribuir com algum subsídio útil aos que as estudam, no que diz respeito ao concurso dos abnegados instrutores espirituais, que trabalham afanosamente em prol do progresso da criatura humana e do planeta que nos serve de domicílio e oportunidade de crescimento interior.

title: Shaar HaBitachon - Das Tor des Vertrauens zu HaShem
description:
Shaar HaBitachon - Das Tor des Vertrauens zu HaShem - Einleitung, das Vorwort

In den heiligen Kapiteln von Shaar Habitachon, dem leuchtenden "Tor des Vertrauens", aus der Feder des geschätzten Weisen Rabbeinu Bachya ibn Pekuda aus Spanien aus dem elften Jahrhundert, liegt eine heilige Weisheit. Während die Welt in Aufruhr ist, umhüllt von Stürmen der Ungewissheit und ungesehenen Pfaden, suchen unsere Herzen Zuflucht vor der unerbittlichen Kadenz unserer sterblichen Tage, die voll von Mühsal, Angst und dem Unbekannten sind. Wie können wir unsere Seelen in den heftigsten Stürmen in einem ruhigen Hafen verankern? Wie kann man inmitten der Wirbelstürme des Lebens die Zuflucht der Gelassenheit suchen? Das "Tor des Vertrauens" winkt uns und führt unsere Seelen auf eine göttliche Odyssee zu einem unerschütterlichen Vertrauen in die allmächtige und barmherzige Umarmung von Haschem. In diesem ehrwürdigen Buch wird uns der Weg gezeigt, wie wir die unvorhersehbaren Gezeiten des Lebens mit einem dauerhaften und tiefen Vertrauen in den Allmächtigen meistern können.

(Live Mitschnitte meines Unterrichts - gestreamt u.a. von dem Jüdischen Bildungszentrum Chabad Berlin.)

English:

In the hallowed pages of Shaar Habitachon, the luminous "Gate of Trust", penned by the esteemed eleventh-century sage, Rabbeinu Bachya ibn Pekuda of Spain, there lies a sacred wisdom. As the world convulses, enshrouded in tempests of uncertainty and paths unseen, our hearts seek refuge from the relentless cadence of our mortal days, replete with toil, trepidation, and the unknown. How might we anchor our souls in serene harbor during the fiercest of storms? How does one seek the sanctuary of serenity amidst the maelstroms of life? The "Gate of Trust" beckons us, guiding our souls on a divine odyssey towards an unwavering trust in the omnipotent and merciful embrace of Hashem. Immersed in this revered tome, we are shown the way to navigate life's unpredictable tides with an enduring and profound trust in the Almighty.

(Live recordings of my classes - streamed by the Jewish Education Centre Chabad Berlin, among others).

title: Das Buch Tanya / Lessons in Tanya
description:
In den heiligen Kammern unserer heiligen Traditionen liegt der Tanya - ein Edelstein des jahrhundertealten Erbes von Chabad. Dieses Werk, das sowohl mystischen Charme als auch praktische Weisheit ausstrahlt, ist das Vermächtnis von Rabbi Schneur Zalman von Liadi (1745-1812), dem leuchtenden Stern der Chabad-Lubawitsch-Konstellation. Der Kern des Tanja spiegelt die tiefe Frage der Menschheit wider: Wer sind wir inmitten der immer stärker werdenden und schwindenden Gezeiten des Glaubens? An manchen Tagen tanzen unsere Seelen zu den melodischen Rhythmen des Judentums und der Spiritualität, und an anderen Tagen finden sie Trost in den einfacheren Freuden des Lebens. Man kann sich fragen, wie ein vom göttlichen Funken berührtes Herz jemals nach irdischen Sehnsüchten verlangen kann. Mit Anmut leuchtet der Tanya in das komplizierte Geflecht unserer Seele und enthüllt unser dualistisches Wesen. Durch ihre Weisheit navigieren wir durch die weiten Meere der täglichen inneren Auseinandersetzungen. Auch wenn unser geschätzter Kodex des jüdischen Gesetzes den Bauplan des Lebens akribisch skizziert, bleibt eine tiefere Sehnsucht. Unsere Handlungen mögen die göttlichen Weisungen widerspiegeln, doch es besteht eine Kluft: eine unberührte Distanz zwischen unserem inneren Selbst und unserer heiligen Tora. Wie ein meisterhafter Architekt baut der Tanya eine Brücke zwischen der Seele und ihren frommen Bestrebungen. Sie formt unsere Tora und Mitzvot zu einer echten Reflexion unseres Wesens und ermöglicht es dem Herzen, wirklich mit dem Puls der jüdischen Identität zu schwingen. Aber wenn Sie sich auf den Weg machen, sollten Sie diese heiligen Wahrheiten bedenken: Der Tanja ist keine bloße Schriftrolle, die man leichtfertig durchblättert - sie verlangt Konzentration, Ehrfurcht und Hingabe. Er ist kein bloßes Gefäß für flüchtige Inspiration, ohne Geschichten oder wöchentliche Parscha-Perlen. Die Reise durch den Tanya ist keine flüchtige Eskapade - sie erfordert aufrichtiges Engagement, eine ernsthafte Wanderung. Mehr als Worte ist der Tanya - ein Herzschlag, der jede Tora-Schriftrolle und jede Mitzwa rhythmisch mit Leben füllt.

Live Mitschnitte meines Unterrichts - gestreamt u.a. von dem Jüdischen Bildungszentrum Chabad Berlin.

English: In the hallowed chambers of our sacred traditions, lies the Tanya — a gemstone of Chabad’s age-old legacy. This opus, radiant with both mystic charm and practical wisdom, is the legacy of Rabbi Schneur Zalman of Liadi (1745–1812), the luminous star of the Chabad-Lubavitch constellation.The Tanya's core echoes with humanity’s profound query: Who are we amidst the ever-waxing and waning tides of faith? Some days, our souls dance to the melodic rhythms of Judaism and spirituality, and on others, they find solace in life's simpler pleasures. One may wonder, how can hearts touched by divine spark ever crave earthly desires?With grace, Tanya shines its guiding light upon our soul's intricate tapestry, unveiling our dualistic essence. Through its wisdom, we navigate the vast seas of daily internal skirmishes.While our cherished Code of Jewish Law meticulously sketches life's blueprint, there remains a deeper yearning. Our actions might mirror divine directives, yet there exists a chasm: an untouched distance between our inner self and our sacred Torah. Tanya, like a masterful architect, crafts a bridge between the soul and its devout aspirations. It molds our Torah and mitzvot into a genuine reflection of our essence, allowing the heart to genuinely resonate with the pulse of Jewish identity. More than words, the Tanya is a heartbeat, rhythmically infusing life into every Torah scroll and mitzvah.

Live recordings of my classes - streamed by the Jewish Education Centre Chabad Berlin.

title: Likkutei Sichot - Deutsch
description:
In den heiligen Schriften unserer Zeit steht "Likkutei Sichos" (hebräisch: ליקוטי שיחות) wie ein leuchtender Wandteppich, der die Essenz und Weite der Lehren des verehrten Lubawitscher Rebben, Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson, zusammenwebt. Von tiefgründigen theologischen Überlegungen bis hin zu den Feinheiten der jüdischen Philosophie, von den geflüsterten Erzählungen der Tora und des Talmuds bis hin zu den mystischen Pfaden der Kabbala - Likkutei Sichos führt Sie durch die unzähligen Dimensionen unseres Glaubens. Verwurzelt in der gesprochenen Weisheit, die Rabbi Schneerson über die Jahreszeiten und heiligen Momente hinweg geteilt hat, umspannen diese Essays die weite Landschaft unserer Tage, angeordnet in Übereinstimmung mit den wöchentlichen Tora-Lesungen und den strahlenden Meilensteinen des jüdischen und chassidischen Kalenders. Während der geweihten Versammlungen - den Farbrengen - am Schabbat und an den Festen, inmitten des rhythmischen Kalenders von Chabad Lubawitsch, teilte Rabbi Schneerson seinen endlosen Fluss der Weisheit, der stundenlang in aller Ruhe fließt. Unter den unzähligen Echos seiner Worte fanden diejenigen, die am tiefsten nachhallten und die das Fundament seiner spirituellen Vision bildeten, ihren geschätzten Platz in den Likkutei Sichos. Diese Worte, die ursprünglich wöchentliche Pergamente zierten, trugen die akribische Handschrift des Rebben, als er sie überprüfte und verfeinerte, bevor er sie der Welt schenkte. Rabbi Schneersons Vermächtnis, ein krönendes Juwel im Wandteppich der chassidischen Geschichte, verkörpert den Zenit des chassidischen Strebens: die verjüngenden Quellen des Chassidus weit und breit zu verbreiten und sie nahtlos mit den unzähligen Schattierungen des Judentums zu verweben. In Likkutei Sichos findet man eine destillierte Essenz der Vision des Rebben, ein Zeugnis ihrer tiefen Tiefe und ihres Aufrufs zum Handeln.

Live Mitschnitte meines Unterrichts - gestreamt u.a. von dem Jüdischen Bildungszentrum Chabad Berlin.

In the sacred annals of our age, "Likkutei Sichos" (Hebrew: ליקוטי שיחות) stands as a luminous tapestry, weaving together the essence and expanse of teachings from the venerated Lubavitcher Rebbe, Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson. This collection serves as a beacon, illuminating Rabbi Schneerson's unparalleled insights into Judaism and the intricate dance of the universe.From profound theological ponderings to the intricacies of Jewish philosophy, from the whispered tales of the Torah and Talmud to the mystic trails of Kabbalah, Likkutei Sichos navigates the myriad dimensions of our faith. Rooted in the spoken wisdom shared by Rabbi Schneerson across seasons and sacred moments, these essays span the vast landscape of our days, arranged in alignment with the weekly Torah readings and the radiant milestones of Jewish and Hasidic calendars. It was during the sanctified gatherings – the farbrengens – on Shabbat and the festivals, amidst the rhythmic calendar of Chabad Lubavitch, that Rabbi Schneerson would share his endless river of wisdom, flowing unhurriedly for hours on end. Amongst the myriad echoes of his words, those that resonated most deeply, that formed the bedrock of his spiritual vision, found their cherished place in the Likkutei Sichos. These words, initially gracing weekly parchments, bore the Rebbe's meticulous touch as he reviewed and refined them before bestowing upon the world Rabbi Schneerson's legacy, a crowning jewel in the tapestry of Hasidic history, embodies the zenith of the Hasidic quest: to spread the rejuvenating springs of Chassidus far and wide, intertwining them seamlessly with the myriad hues of Judaism. In Likkutei Sichos, one finds a distilled essence of the Rebbe's vision, a testament to its profound depth and its beckoning call to action.

Live recordings of my classes - streamed by the Jewish Education Centre Chabad Berlin.

title: Rebbe und Chassid
description:
Rebbe und Chassid

Im Herzen eines Chassid liegt eine tiefe Verbundenheit mit seinem Rebbe, ein Anker tief im weiten Ozean der chassidischen Tradition. Viele in der breiteren jüdischen Welt nehmen diese Verbindung mit einem getrübten Blick wahr. Denn so wie die ätherischsten Wahrheiten des Judentums oft in einem Schleier der Rätselhaftigkeit tanzen, so bleibt auch die Rolle eines Rebben für manche ein geflüstertes Geheimnis, eine oft falsch gehörte oder ganz und gar nicht gesungene Melodie. Wer also ist der Rebbe? Ein Tzaddik, der in Rechtschaffenheit erstrahlt? Eine Koryphäe im riesigen Universum der Tora? Ein Leuchtfeuer, das die Seelen entzündet, das lenkt, erleuchtet und Trost spendet in den Prüfungen des Lebens, sowohl des Geistes als auch des Herzens? Der Rebbe verkörpert all dies und geht doch darüber hinaus. Kein noch so großer Strauß von Lobpreisungen kann die Essenz eines Rebben wirklich einfangen. Denn ein Rebbe ist ein Gefäß, das mit göttlichem Licht überströmt, ein seltenes Juwel, das der Allmächtige in unsere Mitte stellt, Generation für Generation, und das ein Portal zu spirituellen Aussichten jenseits des gewöhnlichen jüdischen Horizonts bietet. In seinem Herzen hegt ein Rebbe keine irdischen Sehnsüchte, außer der Umarmung des Göttlichen, dem Streben nach den Geboten der Tora und der Führung der Seelen auf diesem heiligen Pfad. Das unterscheidet ihn selbst von den am meisten verehrten Tora-Gelehrten. Obwohl der Wandteppich der Chassidim reich und vielfältig ist, gewebt aus einzigartigen Traditionen und Bräuchen, gibt es einen goldenen Faden, der sie alle verbindet: das unnachgiebige Band zwischen den Chassidim und ihrem Rebbe. Aus Angst vor Parallelen zu anderen Glaubensrichtungen haben sich einige Juden, vielleicht aus Unwissenheit, manchmal von ihnen abgewandt oder sogar tiefe Wahrheiten, die in ihrem eigenen Erbe verwurzelt sind, in Frage gestellt. Wie, so fragen sie sich, kann ein Sterblicher in unserem direkten Bund mit dem Göttlichen eine so verehrte Stellung einnehmen? Missverständnisse über dieses heilige Band, das Bündnis zwischen Rebbe und Chassid, und seine Bedeutung in der großen Erzählung des Judentums können zu falschen Vorstellungen führen. Das Ziel dieses Bandes ist es, diesen Nebel zu vertreiben und das Vermächtnis und die überragende Rolle eines Rebben in der jüdischen Odyssee sowie seine tiefe Verwandtschaft mit seinen Schülern zu beleuchten.

Live Mitschnitte meines Unterrichts - gestreamt u.a. von dem Jüdischen Bildungszentrum Chabad Berlin.

In the heart of a Chassid, there lies a profound bond with their Rebbe, an anchor deep within the vast ocean of Chassidic tradition. Many, in the wider Jewish tapestry, perceive this tie with a clouded gaze. For just as the most ethereal truths of Judaism often dance in veils of enigma, so too does the role of a Rebbe remain a whispered secret to some, a melody often misheard or altogether unsung. So who, then, is the Rebbe? A tzaddik, resplendent in righteousness? A luminary of Torah's vast universe? A beacon who kindles souls, who steers, enlightens, and provides solace in life's trials, both of spirit and of heart? The Rebbe embodies all these and yet transcends them. No bouquet of praises, however grand, can truly capture the essence of a Rebbe. For a Rebbe is a vessel overflowing with Divine light, a rare gem that the Almighty sets amidst us, generation after generation, offering a portal to spiritual vistas beyond the ordinary Jewish horizon. ... Misunderstandings of this sacred bond, the Rebbe-chassid alliance, and its significance in Judaism's grand narrative can breed misconceptions. This tome's quest is to dispel these mists and shine a luminous beacon on the legacy and paramount role of a Rebbe in the Jewish odyssey and his deep kinship with his disciples.

Live recordings of my classes - streamed by the Jewish Education Centre Chabad Berlin.

title: Transtornos Psiquiátricos e Obsessivos
description:
"Transtornos Psiquiátricos e Obsessivos" é um livro psicografado por Divaldo Franco, de autoria do espírito Manoel Philomeno de Miranda. O livro aborda profundamente a compreensão dos transtornos mentais e obsessivos à luz da doutrina espírita.

O autor espiritual narra o nobre trabalho de dedicados Benfeitores desencarnados que, atendendo aos anseios de trabalhadores espíritas, que mourejam numa clínica psiquiátrica, desejosos de receber mais ampla ajuda para o mister da saúde mental dos internados, instalaram um centro de atividades especializadas naquele nosocômio. São relatados os esforços e as providências tomadas pelos Espíritos superiores, enquanto estudam e apresentam soluções para os diversos transtornos de alguns dos internados na clínica. Diversos aspectos dos distúrbios mentais e de comportamento são elucidados com riqueza de detalhes, contribuindo para o esclarecimento de todos que tiverem a oportunidade de ler o livro. Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, na condição de repórter gentil, entrevista diversos Mensageiros do Mundo causal, oferecendo-nos páginas enriquecedoras, cujo conteúdo jamais será esquecido.

Além disso, o livro oferece orientações práticas para lidar com os desafios dos transtornos mentais e obsessivos, incluindo o cultivo de virtudes, a prática da prece, a reforma íntima e a busca pelo autoconhecimento como meios de superação e cura.

title: Estudando o Evangelho
description:
O estudo do Evangelho de Jesus envolve a leitura atenta dos textos bíblicos, a reflexão sobre seus ensinamentos e a aplicação de seus princípios na vida diária. Essa prática busca compreender a mensagem de amor, compaixão, perdão e ensinamentos morais transmitidos por Jesus Cristo.

O Novo Testamento é um compilado de 27 de livros da Bíblia cristã, distribuídos em 260 capítulos, escritos originalmente em grego, entre 50 e 150 d.C. Está dividido em 4 partes: Os Evangelhos, O Livro Histórico, As Epístolas e o Livro Profético.

Nesta série, encontraremos valiosas orientações para enfrentar os desafios da vida, além de aprendermos a lidar com situações éticas e morais de forma mais consciente e assertiva.

title: Haggai 1 - Consider your Ways
description:
Consider your ways = to set your mind, heart, & soul on course with God.

Consider = Set

Your = is your inner man – heart, mind, & soul.

Ways = path and course

Here’s an overview of what Haggai longs for the people of God to Consider and what we can learn from Haggai today:

Reset Priorities -

Take a deep look inward to your own ways – What motivates you to do what you do? What is your highest priority or big 3 in life?

Realigned Purposes -

Glance outward to the world around us and the work, The world you is need desperate need of spiritual repair and renewal that only Christ can bring.

Renewed Worship -

Gaze at the Lord of Hosts: When we set our hearts, minds, souls on the Lord of Hosts Then allow the Word of the Lord to change them.

title: From Religion to Self
description:
Hello everyone, welcome to From Religion to Self Podcast with your host Terry Malatji.

Who is Terry Malatji?

I am a life coach, spiritual teacher, author & educator of Principles & Tools of Creation. I am also a founder of Life with Terry - a coaching, wellness, & education company established to help people create & live a fulfilled life, create effectively & efficiently , and embark on a life journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing.

PURPOSE OF PODCAST

This podcast was created to talk about religion, indoctrination, colonisation and brain washing & reversal thereof. I use the word Self to refer to the original version of the body, the spirt, mind and soul before colonisation, indoctrination and brain washing caused by religion.

I was indoctrinated, colonised and brainwashed for decades by Christian religion, from the time I was born until 2019 when I embarked on a beautiful journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing. Since then I have never looked back.

The decolonisation of the faith-based religion, surprisingly led to further decolonisation of multiple non-faith based religions and human made systems that unfortunately limit our abilities to find and manifest Self.

This podcast is one of the platforms that I will use to manifest the undeniable deep calling of sharing my journey, enlightening & healing others as we raise the individual & collective consciousness of the human race. The podcast will help you create & live a fulfilled life, create effectively & efficiently, embark on life journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing.

There is no better time than now. What a time to be alive, in the presence of a powerful force filled with the energy of truth & healing of human race.

The ultimate goal of this podcast is to help my non-indoctrinated listeners to understand the impact of religion on a human being & find better ways to relate with those who are indoctrinated. It is also to enlighten my listeners who are colonised and brainwashed, to remember who they are, heal & restore themselves from multiple traumas caused by religion.

May you find healing, freedom, peace, joy, happiness, love, health, light & every positive energy that you can think, raise your consciousness of as we embark on this beautiful journey together. May you connect with Self and become the creator that you are destined to become.

Visit https://www.lifewithterry.com

NB! Please note that episodes 3-8 were moved from the Podcast Life with Terry @ https://rss.com/podcasts/lifewithterry/.

We are also pleased to announce that we have a new Podcast dedicated to the subject matter of Principles & Tools of Creation. Tune in @ https://rss.com/podcasts/principlesandtoolsofcreation/ and be empowered. Become the creator that you were meant to be.

title: MM Akbar
description: M. Mohammed Akbar, popularly known as MM Akbar, a renowned orator and comparative religion scholar, has been serving as director of Niche of Truth since 1992. The Cochin-based islamic missionary organization's objective is to present Islam as a comprehensive religion in front of India's pluralist society. Niche of Truth use all modern facilities for Dawa work and these include correspondence courses, websites, dialogues, debates, and periodicals. They try to focus on the culture of dialogue and dispelling hatred of Islam.

title: Project S.M.I.L.E
description: "Spiritually Minded is Life Eternal" is a profound and contemplative phrase that encapsulates a profound spiritual concept. It suggests that a person who maintains a deep, introspective connection with their inner self and a higher power experiences a sense of eternal life beyond the physical realm. This phrase emphasizes the importance of nurturing one's spiritual well-being as a pathway to a richer, more meaningful existence that transcends the limitations of mortal life. It serves as a reminder to prioritize spiritual growth, mindfulness, and a connection to the divine for a fulfilling and enduring life journey.
